articles.description: Microsoft confirms future Bethesda games will be exclusive to Xbox Game Pass, PC
articles.content: Microsoft has confirmed everyones worst fear from its recent acquisition of venerated game maker Bethesda that some of the titles will be exclusive to the companys own Xbox gaming console.Microsoft d… [+2242 chars]
